text.section: There is created the radon mitigation and control fund as a separate trust and agency fund in the State Treasury, to be administered by the cabinet. All fees, fines, and other moneys received by the cabinet pursuant to KRS 211.9101 to 211.9135 shall be deposited in the fund and shall be used for the implementation of KRS 211.9101 to 211.9135, and are hereby appropriated for those purposes.
Notwithstanding KRS 45.229, any moneys remaining in the fund at the close of the fiscal year shall not lapse but shall be carried forward to the next fiscal year.
Any interest earnings of the fund shall become part of the fund and shall not lapse.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 17, effective June 8, 2011.
